concept.title: What is the Packet Service ?
concept.shortdesc: The packet service enables the client applications to control the packet switched connections.

conbody.p: The Packet service API is implemented by RPacketService. The client must create an instance of RPhone to open a RPacketService connection.

section.title: Packet service functions
section.p: The packet service functions enable the client applications to do the following:

li.p: attach and remove the device from the GPRS network
create, open, close and configure a context
retrieve GPRS information from the packet network capabilities
control the configuration of connections to a packet network
get and set information about the packet network interfaces (NIFs)
get and set the attach mode
notify the client of a change in attach mode
